title: (x) "Inform" bold sans caps - Lucida Sans {Marc O}
content:
anybody know what typeface this is? the fact that it’s bold is kinda messing with my identifying abilities; which are severely lacking to begin with.

thanks.

author: Kenny Bania

comments.content:
Lucida Sans Bold  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/lucidasans/lucida-sans-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503010725/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/lucidasans/lucida-sans-bold/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/lucidasans/lucida-sans-bold/")

(or perhaps Lucida Grande Bold, depending on the age of the sample)

Lucida Grande / Sans Bold — they both look the same in my book.

Ow that’s just great... Props to Marc!
